column4: Hi, I have just intalled ubuntu 8.10 ...I started well, but later the system started to freeze, any clues at all?
My ubuntu system is freezing a lot and I have to restart it from time to time to get it working...any clues to why this is hapening...is it a bug...I am runing ubuntu 8.10
in previous release (Hardy Heron) you have the same problem?
I use to run debian on it, this is the first time I run ubuntu...but, may I ask you why...cause I used to get similar problem with debian?
